summary: All three requirements have been fully implemented. The diff shows proper ICRC-1 Account type definitions with subaccount as optional array field, account construction using getDefaultAccount helper with subaccount: [], comprehensive debug logging, and consistent usage across frontend components (useInfinityCoinBalance, SendPage, ReceivePage).

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of getDefaultAccount helper function in lib/infinityLedger
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify creating a getDefaultAccount helper function. The requirement only mentions fixing account object construction directly in the hook and ensuring type definitions match ICRC-1 spec. While this is a reasonable implementation detail, it was not requested.
